title: Impossible to delete selected label [NER sequence labelling]
body:
Hi Team,

Something happened, I believe in versions above 1.4.1, and now I cannot work properly with sequence labelling, please see below print screens from version 1.4.1 and 1.5.2, **the new design won't allow me to remove selected labels**. I tried both Docker and pip installation of 1.5.2 and it was the same (I tested 1.4.1 using pip installation and it's working perfectly fine). Is there a chance for any quick fix/advice? 

From version 1.4.1: You can delete each label by clicking x
![Zrzut ekranu 2021-11-22 o 12 45 12](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62895686/142864336-1d85b625-b5d7-41d9-863c-aa56e5f77a9c.png)


From version 1.5.2: You cannot delete selected label (I tried to click anywhere around annotation, use Delete button etc, nothing works for me)
![Zrzut ekranu 2021-11-22 o 13 28 32](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62895686/142864699-2533b785-9391-4ce4-a479-59f56cdcf202.png)


<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System: macOS-10.16-x86_64-i386-64bit 
*   Python Version Used: 3.9.6
*   When you install doccano: 22.11.2021 (but also used it in October, and it worked differently back then)
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): Docker and pip installations (few versions using pip)

Please let me know if you've already seen this issue and if there is anything we can do about it? 

PS. How can I get specific version (1.4.2 for me) on Docker?
